job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams. As a result, you will need to be able to:
     * Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
     * Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
     * Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.

   To do that, it's essential you bring the following:
   *
     * Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
     * Understanding of MLOps best practices.
     * Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
     * Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs
job_details.full_text:
AI/ML Senior Full-Stack Engineer

As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams. As a result, you will need to be able to:
     * Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
     * Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
     * Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.

   To do that, it's essential you bring the following:
   *
     * Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
     * Understanding of MLOps best practices.
     * Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
     * Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and maintaining RESTful ML model APIs, understanding MLOps best practices, and the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms. While it mentions AI/ML toolkits, the core focus leans towards the engineering and operationalization of traditional ML models rather than generative AI applications. The mention of guiding junior developers in AI/ML and working with clients on ML strategies further supports a profile centered on the practical application and deployment of ML.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms' directly relates to the core principles and creation of machine learning models.
job_tasks.phrase: Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs' describes the development of software interfaces for ML models, which is a core software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Understanding of MLOps best practices' directly refers to the operational aspects of deploying and managing ML models in production.

The phrases 'Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues' and 'Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team' indicate a need for technical guidance and mentorship, which falls under communication and collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues' and 'Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team' indicate a need for technical guidance and mentorship, which falls under communication and collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies' shows the need to communicate and collaborate with external stakeholders to understand and address their needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies
